//Assignmnetno3-Create one static method and call in inside a main method
package automation;

public class assignmnet3 {
	
	static void add()
	{
		int a=23;
		int b=45;
		int c=a+b;
		System.out.println(+c);
	}

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		add();

	}

}
